full_text:
a Bell and Howell S7. 12 mp, video, night vision, voice recorder. $90. The
same camera is also sold as a Megxon X57nv on Ebay for $50. $55 will get

On Sun, Oct 2, 2011 at 5:56 PM, jamietreetalker <thequilldriver@...>wrote:

> **
>
>
> I'm not sure I'm hearing much in the EVPs becuase they're so distant
> sounding, but I think the photos are interesting. What were they shot with?
> The one with the man walking on the right was particularly curious!
>
> Jamie
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Vicky Cox <vickyw222@...> wrote:
> >
> > I was looking for some practice on investigating so I found an old small
> > cemetery. It is a couple hundred yards from the state's largest supplier
> of
> > crushed limestone for the last 100 years. The grass was mowed but that
> was
> > the extent of the upkeep. Many tombstones were broken and tossed to the
> > outside edge of the cemetery. Many children were buried there. The oldest
> > tombstone we found was1815. It was 60 degrees the whole time were there.
> We
> > were sooo cold and we could easily see our breath. I've never heard of
> any
> > paranormal experiences regarding here and we've decided to keep
> > it anonymous in an attempt to preserve what is left. The photos are kind
> of
> > "iffy" I might be seeing things where there isn't anything. I'd
> appreciate
> > any feedback.
> >
> > EVPs <http://paranormalarcheologysurveyteam.weebly.com/evps.html>
> >
> > Photos <http://paranormalarcheologysurveyteam.weebly.com/photos.html>
> >
> > --
> > Vicky
> >
>
>  
>



-- 
Vicky
